apiWarning.title: API Configuration Required
apiWarning.description: To analyze security indicators, you need to configure at least one API key.

input.label: Enter Security Indicators
input.placeholder: Paste IP addresses, domains, hashes, URLs, or other security indicators here...

providerNoResults.title: No Results from {{provider}}
providerNoResults.description: This provider does not support these indicator types.

noDetection.title: No Indicators Detected
noDetection.description: No security indicators (IOCs) were found in the provided text.

welcome.title: Welcome to Ahtapot Security
welcome.description: Quickly analyze cybersecurity indicators (IOCs). Paste IP addresses, domains, hashes, or other indicators in the field above.

rateLimitConfirm.title: Rate Limited Provider

greynoise.message: GreyNoise Community plan has a limit of 50 searches per week (combined with Visualizer usage).
greynoise.question: Do you want to analyze {{count}} indicator(s) with GreyNoise?
greynoise.warning: This will use {{count}} of your weekly quota.

shodan.message: Shodan free plan has a limit of 100 results per month.
shodan.question: Do you want to analyze {{count}} indicator(s) with Shodan?
shodan.warning: This will use {{count}} of your monthly quota.

rateLimitConfirm.skipHint: Analysis will skip this provider if not confirmed
